nl_question: What are the known drug targets expressed in liver tissue?
cypher_translation: MATCH (d:Drug)-[:DrugHasTarget]->(p:Protein)-[:ProteinExpressedInTissue]->(t:Tissue {displayName: 'liver'}) RETURN d.displayName AS DrugName, p.displayName AS ProteinName

nl_question: What are the common disorders associated with genes expressed in both kidney and liver tissues?
cypher_translation: MATCH (t2:Tissue {displayName: 'liver'})<-[:GeneExpressedInTissue]-(g:Gene)-[:GeneExpressedInTissue]->(t1:Tissue {displayName: 'kidney'}) WITH g MATCH (g:Gene)-[:GeneAssociatedWithDisorder]->(d:Disorder) RETURN d.displayName AS DisorderName

nl_question: What are the genomic variants associated with disorders that affect gene expression in the skin epidermis?
cypher_translation: MATCH (v:GenomicVariant)-[:VariantAffectsGene]->(g:Gene)-[:GeneExpressedInTissue]->(t:Tissue {displayName: 'skin epidermis'}) WITH g, v MATCH (g)-[:GeneAssociatedWithDisorder]->(d:Disorder) RETURN v.primaryDomainId AS VariantName, d.displayName AS DisorderName

nl_question: What are the side effects of drugs that target proteins expressed in the stomach?
Which tissues express genes related to the GO term 'immune response'?
cypher_translation: MATCH (go:GO {displayName: 'immune response'})<-[r:ProteinHasGOAnnotation]- (p:Protein) -[:ProteinEncodedByGene]->(g:Gene)-[:GeneExpressedInTissue]->(t:Tissue) RETURN t.displayName AS TissueName

nl_question: Which proteins are known to be expressed in the 'liver'?
What genes are expressed in the 'cerebral cortex'?
cypher_translation: MATCH (g:Gene)-[:GeneExpressedInTissue]->(t:Tissue {displayName: 'cerebral cortex'}) RETURN g.displayName AS GeneName

nl_question: In which tissues is the BRCA1 gene expressed?
How many genes are expressed in the 'spleen'?
Can you list all the tissues available in the graph?
Which genes are expressed in the 'liver'?
What proteins are expressed in the 'cerebral cortex'?
cypher_translation: MATCH (p:Protein)-[:ProteinExpressedInTissue]->(t:Tissue {displayName: 'cerebral cortex'}) RETURN p.displayName AS ProteinName

nl_question: How many unique genes are known to be expressed in the 'lung'?
cypher_translation: MATCH (g:Gene)-[:GeneExpressedInTissue]->(t:Tissue {displayName: 'lung'}) RETURN count(DISTINCT g) AS UniqueGeneCount

nl_question: Which genes are expressed in the 'spleen' tissue?
What proteins are expressed in the 'liver' tissue?
In which tissues is the gene BRCA1 expressed, and with which disorders is it associated?
cypher_translation: MATCH (t:Tissue) <-[:GeneExpressedInTissue]-(g:Gene {displayName: 'BRCA1'})-[:GeneAssociatedWithDisorder]->(d:Disorder) RETURN DISTINCT t.displayName AS Tissue, d.displayName AS Disorder

nl_question: List all tissues where the 'PRC2B' protein is expressed.
Which genes are expressed in both 'kidney' and 'heart' tissues?
